1.0.name: wordpress/all-site-search
1.0.description:
All Site Search provides you with the best search engine for your WordPress Site. It replaces the standard WordPress search with a Complete search, with features never seen before and the Most Relevance available.

All Site Search is totally hassle free to install, set up, and use. Your site will be 100% Safe due to off-site indexing.

Not only that, All Site Search is the first search solution that provides All-Content Search. It enables your visitors to really find the required information on your Site.

And best of all? All Site Search is totally free!

All-Content Search (TM)

With All Site Search your visitors can, for the first time, really find the required information on your Site. This includes Pages, Documents, Images, Sound, Video, Zipped files, Software and Email addresses. (You can of course customize what can be searched for.)

Easy and Hassle Free
